text: A Chinese Presbyterian Church that has bilingual and Chinese services in Sundays. It has an active children's and youth ministry that organizes camps annually. Within the compound is also the Chinese Kindergarten - the first kindergarten in Singapore

This is a bilingual (Chinese/ English) Church with traditional and contemporary worship elements.  Sermons are expository and the culture is family orientated.  It is a convenient short walk from either Zion Road or Havelock Road (enter from Outram Road, NOT Outram hill).  Check out the website before going.
This my church.I went every week.We are celebrating our 140 anniversary this year.This is my big family.
The entrance is too narrow and it causes traffic line outside the busy Outram road
